select count(1) from preferential p inner join shop s on p.shop_id = s.id where 1=1
and s.shop_name like "%"#{shop}"%"
and p.type = #{type}
and p.status = #{status}
and p.title like "%"#{title}"%"
and #{startTime} <= p.end_time
and #{endTime} >= p.start_time
select p.*,s.shop_name as shopName from preferential p inner join shop s on p.shop_id = s.id where p.id = #{id}
